item.title: OCaml Weekly News, 31 Aug 2021
item.description:
1. First beta release of OCaml 4.13.0
  2. Windows-capable Diskuv OCaml 0.1.0
  3. v3.OCaml.org: A roadmap for OCaml's online presence
  4. Software engineer at Wolfram MathCore
  5. memprof-limits (first official release): Memory limits, allocation limits, and thread cancellation, with interrupt-safe resources
  6. OCaml Workshop 2021: Live Stream
  7. Goodbye Core_kernel
